Package org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper

Class SynchronousAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.API
      • org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.SynchronousAPI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SynchronousAutopilotAPI, SynchronousChainNotifierAPI, SynchronousDevAPI, SynchronousInvoicesAPI, SynchronousLndAPI, SynchronousNeutrinoAPI, SynchronousPeersAPI, SynchronousRouterAPI, SynchronousSignerAPI, SynchronousStateServiceAPI, SynchronousVersionerAPI, SynchronousWalletKitAPI, SynchronousWalletUnlockerAPI, SynchronousWatchtowerAPI, SynchronousWatchtowerClientAPI
    public abstract class SynchronousAPI
extends API
    Base call for all Synchronous API implementations. Created by Philip Vendil.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SynchronousAPI

        protected SynchronousAPI​(java.lang.String host,
                         int port,
                         java.io.File trustedServerCertificate,
                         java.io.File macaroonFile)
                  throws javax.net.ssl.SSLException,
                         ClientSideException
        Minimal constructor for setting up a connection with LND Application.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of ldn application
        port - the port of the application.
        trustedServerCertificate - a link of the SSL certificate used by the LND Application.
        macaroonFile - the file pointing to the macaroon to use, or null if no macaroons are used.
        Throws:
        javax.net.ssl.SSLException - if problems occurred setting up the SSL Connection.
        ClientSideException - if problems occurred reading the macaroon file.

      • SynchronousAPI

        protected SynchronousAPI​(java.lang.String host,
                         int port,
                         io.grpc.netty.shaded.io.netty.handler.ssl.SslContext sslContext,
                         MacaroonContext macaroonContext)
        Constructor for setting up a connection with LND Application with more flexible SSL context parameters.
        Parameters:
        host - the hostname of ldn application
        port - the port of the application.
        sslContext - the SSL Context used when connecting the LND Application.
        macaroonContext - the macaroon context to use.

      • SynchronousAPI

        protected SynchronousAPI​(io.grpc.ManagedChannel channel)
        Constructor used for setting up a connection using a GRPC managed channel that can be customized.
        Parameters:
        channel - the managed channel to use.

    • Method Detail

      • processResponse

        protected Message processResponse​(Message responseMessage)
                           throws ValidationException
        Method to convert and validate (if validation is enabled) a response from LDN Server to a wrapped object.
        Parameters:
        responseMessage - the response message to convert
        Returns:
        a wrapped response message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - exception containing a validation report with all validation problems found, if validation is used.

      • processRepeatableResponse

        protected java.util.Iterator<?> processRepeatableResponse​(java.util.Iterator<?> responses)
                                                   throws ValidationException,
                                                          ClientSideException
        Method to convert and validate (if validation is enabled) a iterable response from LDN Server to a wrapped object.
        Parameters:
        responses - the iterable collection of response message to convert
        Returns:
        a wrapped List of response message
        Throws:
        ValidationException - exception containing a validation report with all validation problems found, if validation is used.
        ClientSideException
